con:request.name: Authorization
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1_3" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1_3" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:authorization:v1_3"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn2:agreementId>${Properties#agreementid}</urn2:agreementId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bankId>${Properties#orgid}</urn2:bankId> <urn2:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:customerID> <urn2:productID>10</urn2:productID> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:migrationDate>2018-03-05+05:00</urn2:migrationDate> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn2:corporateGrouping> <urn2:customerId>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:customerId> <urn2:agreementId>${Properties#agreementid}</urn2:agreementId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:parentAgreementId>1234567</urn2:parentAgreementId> <urn2:b2bPollingEnabled>false</urn2:b2bPollingEnabled> </urn2:corporateGrouping> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:agreementAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${Properties#customerid}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>0</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>0</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:psd2Configuration>BOTH</urn2:psd2Configuration> <urn2:access>CREDIT_AND_DEBIT</urn2:access> </urn2:agreementAccount> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:sessionID>${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0,30)}</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>TestCorpFirst</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>TestCorpLast</urn2:lastName> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:bookingLevel>D</urn2:bookingLevel> <urn2:approvalLimit>10000</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>10000</urn2:registerLimit> </urn2:userAccount> </urn2:userData> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> </urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> </urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Step1_UltimateCreditor
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:con="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorSearchRequest> <urn:searchCriteria> <urn1:type>DOMESTIC</urn1:type> <urn1:ultimateCreditorName>${Properties#UltimateCreditor}</urn1:ultimateCreditorName> <urn1:elementControl> <con:StartIndex>0</con:StartIndex> <con:MaximumNumberOfElements>100</con:MaximumNumberOfElements> </urn1:elementControl> </urn:searchCriteria> </urn:CreditorSearchRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select A.PREDEFINEDCREDITORID,A.CREDITORACCOUNT,A.AGREEMENTID,B.PARTYID,B.NAME,B.PARTYTYPE,B.FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID from PDC_PREDEFINEDCREDITOR A,PDC_PARTY B where A.AGREEMENTID = '${Properties#AgreementId}' and A.TYPE = 'DOM' and A.PREDEFINEDCREDITORID = B.FK_PREDEFINEDCREDITORID and B.NAME = '${Properties#UltimateCreditor}' order by A.PREDEFINEDCREDITORID asc

con:request.name: Step2_UltimateCred_NotExists
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:con="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorSearchRequest> <urn:searchCriteria> <urn1:type>INTERNATIONAL</urn1:type> <urn1:ultimateCreditorName>${Properties#UltimateCredNotExists}</urn1:ultimateCreditorName> <urn1:elementControl> <con:StartIndex>0</con:StartIndex> <con:MaximumNumberOfElements>100</con:MaximumNumberOfElements> </urn1:elementControl> </urn:searchCriteria> </urn:CreditorSearchRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns4:CreditorSearchResponse xmlns:ns8="urn:srv.pays.payment.fs.evry.com:ws:agreementcapture:v1_0" xmlns:ns7="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:common:v1" xmlns:ns6="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:ns5="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:ns4="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:ns3="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com" xmlns:ns2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21"> <ns5:ResponseState> <ErrorCode>12</ErrorCode> <Severity>2</Severity> <ComponentId>111</ComponentId> <StrErrorCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <Message>No data found</Message> <NativeError xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <LogSequence xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </ns5:ResponseState> </ns4:CreditorSearchResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: Step3_UltimateCred_ExceedsLength
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentcreditor:v1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:predefinedcreditor:v1" xmlns:con="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value2}" key="${Properties#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value3}" key="${Properties#item3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:CreditorSearchRequest> <urn:searchCriteria> <!--Optional:-->
<urn1:type>INTERNATIONAL</urn1:type> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<urn1:ultimateCreditorName>${Properties#UltimateCredExceedsLength}</urn1:ultimateCreditorName><urn1:elementControl> <con:StartIndex>0</con:StartIndex> <con:MaximumNumberOfElements>100</con:MaximumNumberOfElements> </urn1:elementControl> </urn:searchCriteria> </urn:CreditorSearchRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
